thought: To craft a purple_carpet, I need to first craft a white_carpet. The white_carpet requires placing 2 white_wool side by side in the crafting grid, and since I already have a white_carpet in slot 37, I will move it to the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 37 to slot 1 with quantity 1
